DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 , Bio-equivalence Study TAK-536 Pediatric Formulation
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate bio-equivalence single oral administration TAK-536 pediatric formulation ( granule ) comparison TAK-536 commercial formulation healthy adult male participant open label , 2-period , 2-treatment , cross-over design .
